title: Compromise Will Set You Free
abstract: Our customers invest significant time, energy, and money to collect their assets into a central content management system. They do so with vital strategic goals in mind - single-source publishing; content discovery; rapid product evolution. But many sabotage their efforts by resisting compromises intended to reduce the complexity and inconsistency of their data structures and delivery formats. Instead, they get bogged down with painful conversions - from Word to XML, from XML to InDesign, and so on. But the needed compromises rarely hurt, and almost always bring unexpected benefits like easier content management projects and a deeper customer focus. Lisa will share ideas and customer experiences to inspire you to make the tough decisions.
